Mod.name: Teki no Kichi 2
Mod.author: hpgbproductions
Mod.description:
A battle against an unknown enemy during a time of great change.
This campaign mod includes AceRadar functionality! Install AceRadar for a better experience.

Level.name: Mission 1a
Level.description:
Vehicle: Attacker Location: Shikotan Weather: Scattered Clouds Time: 1000
An unknown group has suddenly invaded most of the Kuril Islands. You have been hired to assist in their removal.
Your first mission is to aid the landing operation on the central village.
TGT: - Destroyer - 6x AA Tank
Additional: - 4x Missile Launcher

Level.name: Mission 1b
Level.description:
Vehicle: Attacker Location: Shikotan Weather: Broken Clouds Time: 1030
The enemy has a significant amount of firepower at the northeast village.
Destroy enemy ships and anti-ship weapons to allow our advance. You may take out enemy armored vehicles along the way.
TGT: - 2x Destroyer - 6x Anti-Ship Missile Launcher
Additional: - 4x Missile Launcher - 4x AA Tank

Level.name: Mission 1c
Level.description:
Vehicle: Attacker Location: Shikotan Weather: Broken Clouds Time: 1100
Destroy the enemy reinforcements to ensure success in capturing the island.
TGT: - 4x VLS Destroyer
Additional: - 2x CIWS Destroyer - 2x Flak Destroyer

Level.name: Mission 2a
Level.description:
Vehicle: Interceptor Location: Iturup Weather: Clear Time: 0700
Long range anti-ship missile launchers have been spotted on Iturup, the next island to capture.
Destroy the launchers quickly.
TGT: - 8x Anti-Ship Missile
Additional: - 8x Missile Launcher - Missile Ship

Level.name: Mission 2b
Level.description:
Vehicle: Bomber/Attacker Location: Iturup Weather: Few Clouds Time: 0200
Both airfields on the island are being controlled by the enemy, who are operating them as air bases. To rid the island of any air resistance, a simultaneous attack on both airfields will be conducted.
Bomb the runway. Make sure to hit all three target points, else the attack would be ineffective. If possible, stay at high altitudes to avoid detection.
TGT: - 3x Runway Target Point
Additional: - 8x Missile Launcher - 5x Fighter - 3x Bomber

Level.name: Mission 2c
Level.description:
Vehicle: Bomber/Attacker Location: Iturup Weather: Few Clouds Time: 0200
Destroy the runway to ground the remaining enemy aircraft. As the enemy forces' leadership is stationed within the airport building, you will be tasked to destroy it as well.
You must stay in the narrow corridor between the towns. Just like before, fly at high altitudes to avoid detection.
TGT: - Runway Target Point - Enemy HQ
Additional: - 7x Missile Launcher - 6x Fighter

Level.name: Mission 2d
Level.description:
Vehicle: Attacker Location: Iturup Weather: Scattered Clouds Time: 0900
Allow the capture force to proceed by destroying the enemy's anti-ship weapons.
The capture of a regional enemy headquarters will grant us a significant strategic advantage.
TGT: - 6x Anti-Ship Missile Launcher
Additional: - 3x Destroyer - 3x Missile Launcher - 2x Missile Ship - 7x AA Tank

Level.name: Mission 3a
Level.description:
Vehicle: Attacker Location: Simushir Weather: Clear Time: 0630
Destroy anti-aircraft weaponry around the enemy-occupied communications station. It will prove to be a useful forward base for our supporting unit.
TGT: - 7x Missile Launcher - 3x Long Range Missile Launcher
Additional: - 3x CIWS Destroyer - 3x Destroyer

Level.name: Mission 3b
Level.description:
Vehicle: Attacker Location: Simushir Weather: Few Clouds Time: 0730
With the communications station captured, our naval forces can begin advancing towards the main base.
Remove all enemy naval resistance around the island. Keep an eye out for enemy long-range SAMs, and destroy them if possible.
TGT: - 4x Missile Ship
Additional: - 5x Long Range Missile Launcher

Level.name: Mission 3c
Level.description:
Vehicle: Attacker Location: Simushir Weather: Scattered Clouds Time: 1000
We now have an opportunity to destroy most of the remaining enemy naval forces.
You will be heavily outnumbered. Focus only on the most valuable targets.
TGT: - 3x VLS Destroyer - Helicopter Carrier
Additional: - 12x Missile Launcher - 3x CIWS Destroyer - Flak Destroyer - Destroyer - Tower

Level.name: Mission 4a
Level.description:
Vehicle: Attacker Location: Onekotan Weather: Broken Clouds Time: 1500
The enemy leaders are stationed in a captured nuclear silo. Capturing them will end the war once and for all.
Again, the enemies have the numbers. Focus on the anti-ship missile launchers and laser defense ships, and allow our naval force to take on the rest.
TGT: - 3x Laser Defense Ship - 6x Anti-Ship Missile Launcher
Additional: - 6x Destroyer - 3x Flak Destroyer - 4x Long Range Missile Launcher

Level.name: Mission 4b
Level.description:
Vehicle: Attacker Location: Onekotan Weather: Broken Clouds Time: 1730
Due to the threat of an ICBM launch, you are granted permission to destroy the missile silos on the island.
Both short- and long-range AA defenses are present, be ready to respond to them at all times.
TGT: - 5x Missile Silo
Additional: - 24x Missile Launcher - 7x Long Range Missile Launcher - Destroyer - Control Room - Core
